snippet: Shows like “Sex Sent Me to the ER” and “Untold Stories of the ER” acknowledge the absurdity of the notion of major surgery as entertainment.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger Critic's Notebook notes reality shows about emergency room visits are more entertaining and even more tasteful than emergency room scenes in medical dramas, which have become cliche.
lead_paragraph: Shows like “Sex Sent Me to the ER” and “Untold Stories of the ER” acknowledge the absurdity of the notion of major surgery as entertainment.
